experience.title: Founder
experience.location: Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates
experience.description: DK Business Consultants came into being with the sole objective of helping job seekers with highly effective, strategic , ATS optimized CVs and LinkedIn profile makeovers. It helps to have a clear, well presented online presence in the digital age we live in today. All that and more for affordable pricing because our goal is to help not overcharge people who are searching for means to support themselves & their families.

experience.title: Retail Area & Bar Manager
experience.location: Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates
experience.description: 1. Managed a team of 20 for both store and bar operations.2. Instrumental in increment of sales of upto 30% in 3 months by implementing social media campaigns & networking with bulk buyers.3. Increased bar sales by 10% with limited resources by introducing innovative food concepts(surprise momo day - 15 AED for 10pcs) and improving existing facilities by liasing with management.4. Took ownership to oversee a 360° renovation of the existing shop from tiles till ceiling - single point of contact for all contractors.5. Preparing reports like damage, UPT/ATV, Daily sales report(Bar+Shop), Petty cash, Security and Cleaner timesheets(managed 7 bouncers and 5 cleaners) as well monthly stock counts/recounts including and not limited to liasing with other shop management for stock transfers, staff transfers and employee appraisals and incident reports. 6. Direct reportee to the General Manager.
experience.description_html: 1. Managed a team of 20 for both store and bar operations.2. Direct reportee to the General Manager.

positions.subtitle: Lagardère Travel Retail
positions.description: ⚫ Part of the Pre Opening team for Zayed International Airport.⚫ Assisted with the shop set up, gondola merchandising, shop operations & point of contact for liquor / tobacco advice to supporting teams.⚫ Liaised with the brand teams & senior management for stocks, planograms & assisted merchandising in outlets such as Le Club, Little Le Club(Entry to Pier B) & Abu Dhabi Duty Free Flagship Store. ⚫ Offered consultant services for Head of Visual Merchandising & Heads of departments for duty free related gondola set up & assisted in the creation of Le Club's Premium alcohol offering - "The Collection". ⚫ Directly involved in the sales of over 100,000 AED from "The Collection" room in just over 3 months since the start of official operations in January 2024.
